delete_account_data: All of the data contributed to Open Assistant by solving tasks, ranking messages, and any conversations had using the chat service, will be retained but in an anonymized fashion, so that it not possible to deduce who the original user was.
delete_account_intro: Deleting an account entails the following:
delete_account_leaderboard: Accounts of deleted users won't show up on the leaderboards
delete_account_permanent: This action is permanent and cannot be undone
